import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("light green")

t = turtle.Turtle()
t.color("blue")

def sqrfunc(size):
	while True:
		t.forward(size)
		t.left(90)
		size = size + 5

sqrfunc(6)
